name: Quick Chicken Cacciatore
description: Traditional one-pot chicken cacciatore is a quick, flavoursome dinner idea best served with pasta.
ingredients: 4 chicken thigh cutlets, skin on and bone in
instructions: Heat oil in a large, deep frypan over medium heat. Pat the chicken dry with paper towel, then season and place, skin-side down, in the pan. Cook for 4 minutes or until skin is golden, then turn and cook until done.
notes: Recipe text was truncated in source - additional ingredients and steps may be needed for a complete cacciatore.
